Title: "The Trial of Trumpades"

In the murky amphitheatre of truth,
A lion prowls, spirit scarred, culled calm.
His stadium, a pen of legalistic gnarls.
Now comes Daniels, sultry in the spotlight,
Her narrative, a silken snare, unraveled.
Frustration snakes on the face of the king,
Cohen's reckoning looms, a storm in the offing,
Two titans teetering in the tabloid thunder,
This circus, their stage, the world watches, wonders.
